dmca.title: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity - MS Ref. 93350
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: MSAntipiracy03 [mailto:Internet3@Microsoft-Antipiracy.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 4:55 AM
To: Abuse, EV1; DMCA Houston
Subject: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity
- MS Ref. 93350

 

* PGP Signed: 06/04/07 at 04:55:26

VIA EMAIL: 

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity 

URL: http://www.stormcert.com/ 
http://www.stormcert.com/pricing.htm 
http://www.stormcert.com/service.htm 
http://www.stormcert.com/contact.htm 
CASE #: 93350 

04 June 2007 

Dear Sir or Madam, 

Microsoft has received information that the domain listed above, which
appears to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed
copies of, or is engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to
copyrighted works published by Microsoft.

1. Identification of copyrighted works: 

Copyrighted work(s): 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Systems Administrator on Microsoft
Windows Server 2003 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Database Administrator 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Database Administrator 2000 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer on Microsoft Windows
2000 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Systems Administrator on Microsoft
Windows 2000 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer on Microsoft Windows
2003 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Database Administrator 2003 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Solution Developer for Microsoft .NET 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Application Developer for Microsoft
.NET 
Certificate: Microsoft Certified Desktop Support Technician 

Copyright owner: 
Microsoft Corporation 

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following
location(s): 

http://www.stormcert.com/ 
http://www.stormcert.com/pricing.htm 
http://www.stormcert.com/service.htm 
http://www.stormcert.com/contact.htm 

The above location is offering to distribute unauthorized copies of
copyrighted works. 

3. Statement of authority: 

The information in this notice is accurate, and I hereby certify under
penalty of perjury that I am authorized to act on behalf of Microsoft,
the owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above.  I have a
good faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above
have been authorized by Microsoft, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you
take expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material
described above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and
distribution of this copyrighted work via your company's network.

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us
regarding what actions you take. 

Yours sincerely, 

Emma Rutherford 
Internet Investigator 

on behalf of Microsoft Corporation 
One Microsoft Way 
Redmond, WA 98052 
United States of America 

E-mail: Internet1@microsoft-antipiracy.com 

* MSAntiPiracy03 <internet3@microsoft-antipiracy.com>
* 0x25BF18FF(L)
